label: 七壇
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Seven-altar rites employed the Seven Healing Buddhas as their main objects of worship and featured recitations of the Yakushi Sutra (p. 84). [七仏薬師]
